name: tRNA (N6-L-threonylcarbamoyladenosine37):sulfur-donor,S-adenosyl-L-methionine C2-methylthiotransferase
definition: N6-L-Threonylcarbamoyladenine in tRNA + Sulfur donor + 2 S-Adenosyl-L-methionine <=> 2-Methylthio-N6-L-threonylcarbamoyladenine in tRNA + S-Adenosyl-L-homocysteine + L-Methionine + 5'-Deoxyadenosine
